## Turn off the Facebook auto-play video feature?

From [moneysavingexpert.com](http://www.moneysavingexpert.com/news/protect/2014/09/facebook-app-user-beware-big-bills-as-videos-automatically-play)

Go to your phone's settings

```
Settings > Facebook > Settings > Select 'Auto-play only on Wi-fi', or 'Off'.
```
